Description:
We help the world see new possibilities and inspire change for better tomorrows. Our analytic solutions bridge content, data, and analytics to help business, people, and society become stronger, more resilient, and sustainable.As a member of our Climate and Resilience team, you will work collaboratively to help deliver a range of projects for global corporate and financial sector clients. Depending on the skills and experience of the successful candidate, this is likely to include:Work on larger-scale GIS datasets for external clients
Analyze, validate, and present results using spreadsheets, charts, and maps
Automate GIS procedures and develop new and innovative ways for geoprocessing team workflows in Python
Work as member of multi-faceted research team and assist team members in ensuring best GIS practices
Create technical documents for internal use and distribution to clients
Develop and update process documentation for technical workflowsEducational Qualifications: PHD, M Tech or M.Sc. (in Geo-Informatics/Geography/Remote Sensing & GIS) or Spatial Technologies.
Total Experience: 3 - 5 years
Fluent in ArcGISPro and QGIS
Strong working knowledge of Python and ARCPy
Demonstrable experience of ArcGIS Enterprise, Open-Source GIS (GDAL, SAGA, GeoDa, etc.), R, SQL Server, Matlab
Must have working knowledge in ArcGIS Extensions: Spatial Analyst, 3D Analyst, Image Analyst, and Network Analyst
Demonstrable working experience of database management and database versioning within ESRI environments
Strong geo-analytics and geoprocessing skills with emphasis on raster format
Ability to work flexibly, to tight deadlines, while managing your own scheduleNice-To-Have:Educational background in Geography/Environmental Science or similar
Strong understanding of climate change and/or security risks and opportunities for organisations and how those interact with social, economic, and political factors
Ability to communicate technical process and data outputs to non-technical audiences
Geo-statistical techniques and data mining
Good mathematical and statistical background.#LI-DR1In 2022, Verisk received Great Place to Work® Certification for our outstanding workplace culture for the sixth year in a row and second-time certification in the UK, Spain, and India.
